description:
KICKICO is an online blockchain-based fundraising platform, which enables the purchase of tokens of projects. The platform has reportedly helped to raise 250,000 ETH for more than 20 projects, such as Micromoney, Hacken, Universa, Playkey, and INS. The KICK ECOSYSTEM aims to revitalize how tokens and coins are offered, bought, and sold for startups and token buyers.  The ecosystem comprises an exchange (KICKEX), a white label token sale solution (KICKDESK), STO listing and trading, a unified login system (KICKID), a multicurrency wallet (KICKWALLET), a crypto payment gateway (KICKPAY), ad network integration (KICKCPA), a referral network (KICKREF), a mobile app (KICKMOBILE), and exchange-pricing solutions (AICO and IECO). At the center of this ecosystem is KickCoin.

name: KickToken
